Package com.boole.jgmp.math.helpers

Class JGMPCollisionH

java.lang.Object
com.boole.jgmp.math.helpers.JGMPCollisionH
public class JGMPCollisionH extends Object
Collision Checking Helper with optimized collision checking methods between provided shapes in the JGMP Library.
Provided Shapes: JGMPRay2, JGMPCircle, JGMPRect
Source Code for the Shape Models can be found in ~/com/boole/jgmp/math/shapes/

  • Method Details

    • isIntersecting

      public static boolean isIntersecting(JGMPRay2 a, JGMPRay2 b)
      Static collision check method to check whether 2 Lines are intersecting each other.
      If there is a solution between the equations of the 2 lines then they are colliding.
      Parameters:
      a - JGMPRay2 - Ray2D a
      b - JGMPRay2 - Ray2D b
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the 2 lines are intersecting each other.

    • isColliding

      public static boolean isColliding(JGMPRect a, JGMPRect b)
      Static collision check method to check whether two 2D Rectangles are colliding with each other or not.
      Compares all 4 points of both rectangles to see whether the 2 rectangles are colliding or not.
      Parameters:
      a - JGMPRect - Rectangle A
      b - JGMPRect - Rectangle B
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether 2 rectangles are colliding.

    • isColliding

      public static boolean isColliding(JGMPRect a, JGMPRay2 b)
      Static collision check method to check whether a 2D Rectangle and a 2D Ray are colliding with each other.
      If any of the 4 sides of the rectangle are intersecting with a 2d Ray, the whole Rectangle is colliding with the 2D Ray.
      Parameters:
      a - JGMPRect - Rectangle A
      b - JGMPRay2 - Ray2D b
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether a rectangle and a line collide with each other.

    • isColliding

      public static boolean isColliding(JGMPCircle a, JGMPRay2 b)
      Static collision check method to check whether a Circle and a Line are colliding with each other.
      If the shortest distance from the center of the circle and the line is less than or equal to the radius then the line and circle must intersect at some point.
      The ray that is passed in will be treated as a line, meaning that both endpoints of the ray will be extended infinitely like a line.
      Parameters:
      a - JGMPCircle - Circle a
      b - JGMPRay2 - Ray2D b (as a line and NOT a line segment which means that both points are extended infinitely)
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the circle and line are colliding with each other.

    • isTangent

      public static boolean isTangent(JGMPCircle a, JGMPRay2 b)
      Static collision check method to check whether the given Line is tangent with the Circle.
      If the shortest distance from the center of the circle and the line is equal to the radius then the line is tangent.
      The ray that is passed in will be treated as a line, meaning that both endpoints of the ray will be extended infinitely like a line.
      Parameters:
      a - JGMPCircle - Circle a
      b - JGMPRay2 - Ray2D b (as a line and NOT a line segment which means that both points are extended infinitely)
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the line is tangent to the circle.

    • isColliding

      public static boolean isColliding(JGMPCircle a, JGMPRect b)
      Static collision check method to check whether a Circle and a 2D Rectangle are colliding with each other.
      If any of the sides of the rectangle are colliding with the circle then the rectangle is also colliding with the circle
      Parameters:
      a - JGMPCircle - Circle a
      b - JGMPRect - Rectangle b
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the circle and rectangle are colliding with each other.

    • isColliding

      public static boolean isColliding(JGMPCircle a, JGMPCircle b)
      Static collision check method to check whether 2 circles are colliding with each other.
      If the distance between the 2 centers are less than or equal to the sum of the radii, then the circles must be colliding.
      Parameters:
      a - JGMPCircle - Circle a
      b - JGMPRay2 - Ray2D b
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the circle and 2D ray are colliding with each other.
